entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Cornwall
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:59 AM EST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: 6.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Saint-Anicet 12:00 PM EST Saturday 31 December 2022
Temperature: 6.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 6.9°C
Wind: NNE 1 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday: Rain. Temperature steady near 6.

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of rain or snow. Low plus 1.
